title: crypto_tjay
author: crypto_tjay
content: THE PERSUIT OF HAPPYNESSI love this movie. Can you suggest any movie like this?

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: One of the best movies ever.There's a lot of them and from this list --> https://www.endlesspopcorn.com/movies-like-the-pursuit-of-happyness/The next best is the Shawshank Redemption. My good friend who's an engineer suggested me this. I never heard a lot of movies until someone recommends it to me.And after watching it, I have to watch it the 2nd time around and I just can't stop. Until now, I've got a copy of it on my phone.

comments.body: Quote from: boyptc on November 29, 2023, 12:55:11 PMOne of the best movies ever.There's a lot of them and from this list --> https://www.endlesspopcorn.com/movies-like-the-pursuit-of-happyness/The next best is the Shawshank Redemption. My good friend who's an engineer suggested me this. I never heard a lot of movies until someone recommends it to me.And after watching it, I have to watch it the 2nd time around and I just can't stop. Until now, I've got a copy of it on my phone.Shawshank Redemption is the best!!!

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: anna_20 on November 29, 2023, 01:15:54 PMQuote from: boyptc on November 29, 2023, 12:55:11 PMOne of the best movies ever.There's a lot of them and from this list --> https://www.endlesspopcorn.com/movies-like-the-pursuit-of-happyness/The next best is the Shawshank Redemption. My good friend who's an engineer suggested me this. I never heard a lot of movies until someone recommends it to me.And after watching it, I have to watch it the 2nd time around and I just can't stop. Until now, I've got a copy of it on my phone.Shawshank Redemption is the best!!! I know right.  I am sure that there are other members of the forum that have seen the movie and they have the same expression as us when it's about the movie. If OP hasn't watched it yet then he has to start with that from the list that I've provided to him.

comments.author: Ricardo11
comments.body: I always prefer to watch Hollywood movies. I always watch Hollywood movies from MARVLE STUDIO. MARVLE STUDIO'S "AVENGERS END GAME" is the best movie I have ever seen. I have seen almost all of the "AVENGERS" movies. Avengers movies are really entertaining.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Quote from: crypto_tjay on November 29, 2023, 04:31:38 AMTHE PERSUIT OF HAPPYNESSI love this movie. Can you suggest any movie like this?  Have watched this several times and still love watching so I agree with you that this is one of the best movies I've watched .wanna add some like >  -Behind Enemy Lines   -Silence of the Lambs  -Cold Mountainsthey are might classic movies but you will never regret watching them , to follow some of my list sooner as I am still struggling to remember them all as of they are so many lol .

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: crypto_tjay on November 29, 2023, 04:31:38 AMTHE PERSUIT OF HAPPYNESSI love this movie. Can you suggest any movie like this?  well have stopped watching Movies recently instead I am watching series that made me feel enjoying and killing my time.Here is - SHAMELESShttps://www.netflix.com/watch/81404822?trackId=14170286Here is - YOUNG SHELDONhttps://www.netflix.com/browse?jbv=80192612i think you will also enjoy those series that made me watching for couple of weeks now and yet not done because they both runs for 10 or more season with 10s of episode as well. perfect if you wanted to enjoy and kill your time .

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: Quote from: crypto_tjay on November 29, 2023, 04:31:38 AMTHE PERSUIT OF HAPPYNESSI love this movie. Can you suggest any movie like this?  One of the best movie of Will Smith aside from my most favorite "I am Legend"  in which for me  the best of the best of Will Smith as i watched the movie more than 5x now. but my list would be " A Man Called Otto" "News World" and" Saving Private Ryan" in which all movies of Tom Hanks and also try to watch Denzel Washington and Nicholas Cage Movies that will touch your Movie watching experiences .

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Quote from: crypto_tjay on November 29, 2023, 04:31:38 AMTHE PERSUIT OF HAPPYNESSI love this movie. Can you suggest any movie like this?  It will be better if you mention which genre you are most interested in watching."The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind"-2019 can be in everyone's bucket list and one movie that you must watch available on Netflix.https://www.reddit.com/r/movies/ is a better place to get suggestions in my opinion.

comments.author: cute nmp
comments.body: You want a real movie with real action . I will suggest JOHN WICK its a great movie think you should check it out .

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: jrrsparkles on December 01, 2023, 06:48:06 AM"The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind"-2019 can be in everyone's bucket list and one movie that you must watch available on Netflix.I have seen being recommended on me because I've watched it on a short video film of its highlights. I honestly think that the whole movie is touching. Yeah, this is a good suggestion to happy and it's the same to the genre of what he's looking for.

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Quote from: rodskee on November 30, 2023, 07:31:46 AMbut my list would be " A Man Called Otto" "News World" and" Saving Private Ryan" in which all movies of Tom Hanks Tom Hanks is incredible in his depth.   Castaway and Greyhound are two of my favs.   (If you have a good movie setup with edge lighting, Greyhound is mesmerizing!)

comments.body: Quote from: cute nmp on December 03, 2023, 06:41:23 PMYou want a real movie with real action . I will suggest JOHN WICK its a great movie think you should check it out .I may agree  in John Wick Movies but the last part? I believe that there will be next  one because of how the ending shows so basically here we  go again for long running movies continuity .Quote from: boyptc on December 03, 2023, 09:37:16 PMQuote from: jrrsparkles on December 01, 2023, 06:48:06 AM"The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind"-2019 can be in everyone's bucket list and one movie that you must watch available on Netflix.I have seen being recommended on me because I've watched it on a short video film of its highlights. Movie that also made me cry , This movie is world class and how heroic the boy is for the whole community if not the whole country .

comments.author: crea8iveant
comments.body: Quote from: cute nmp on December 03, 2023, 06:41:23 PMYou want a real movie with real action . I will suggest JOHN WICK its a great movie think you should check it out .Absolutely. The entire series is worth watching and also 5th part will be in making too.Here are my favorite picks in Action and Thriller genre:Taken (1-3)RED (1 & 2)Death WishThe Expendables (1-3)The Gray ManMission Impossible (1-7)Extraction (1 & 2)Red NoticeJack ReacherThe Equalizer (1 & 2)BrightBaby DriverWhite House DownArmy of ThievesBourne (1-5)I can go for 100 more but these just were on top of my mind.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: peter0425 on December 04, 2023, 04:50:05 AMQuote from: boyptc on December 03, 2023, 09:37:16 PMQuote from: jrrsparkles on December 01, 2023, 06:48:06 AM"The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind"-2019 can be in everyone's bucket list and one movie that you must watch available on Netflix.I have seen being recommended on me because I've watched it on a short video film of its highlights. I honestly think that the whole movie is touching. Yeah, this is a good suggestion to happy and it's the same to the genre of what he's looking for. Movie that also made me cry , This movie is world class and how heroic the boy is for the whole community if not the whole country .It's a true story so knowing that it's happened in real life and some kid on the other side of the world dealt with that hardship is truly giving the emotional feels.Quote from: crea8iveant on December 04, 2023, 07:24:02 AMArmy of ThievesHmmm, it has got a different vibe from what OP is asking for. I've seen this movie and its genre is far from the Pursuit of Happiness.

comments.author: Jinx9975
comments.body: I suggest "Pirates of the Carribean" One of best move series of all time

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Quote from: peter0425 on December 04, 2023, 04:50:05 AMQuote from: cute nmp on December 03, 2023, 06:41:23 PMYou want a real movie with real action . I will suggest JOHN WICK its a great movie think you should check it out .Yes, the writing for the next chapter is in notion for a while and now its been officially confirmed but it will take years for the movie to be completed. I am a fan of John Wick movies too but now it seems action movies are overrated and slipping far away from reality.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Quote from: boyptc on December 04, 2023, 11:53:27 PMQuote from: peter0425 on December 04, 2023, 04:50:05 AMQuote from: boyptc on December 03, 2023, 09:37:16 PMQuote from: jrrsparkles on December 01, 2023, 06:48:06 AM"The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind"-2019 can be in everyone's bucket list and one movie that you must watch available on Netflix.I have seen being recommended on me because I've watched it on a short video film of its highlights. I honestly think that the whole movie is touching. Yeah, this is a good suggestion to happy and it's the same to the genre of what he's looking for. Movie that also made me cry , This movie is world class and how heroic the boy is for the whole community if not the whole country .It's a true story so knowing that it's happened in real life and some kid on the other side of the world dealt with that hardship is truly giving the emotional feels.Ohh , that means it is indeed a real life story ? though its been said in the movie yet i still figuring in my mind how that young can create such brilliant Idea that the whole community if not the whole coutnry .. thanks for this mate!!!Quote from: jrrsparkles on December 06, 2023, 06:33:38 PMQuote from: peter0425 on December 04, 2023, 04:50:05 AMQuote from: cute nmp on December 03, 2023, 06:41:23 PMYou want a real movie with real action . I will suggest JOHN WICK its a great movie think you should check it out .Yes, the writing for the next chapter is in notion for a while and now its been officially confirmed but it will take years for the movie to be completed. I am a fan of John Wick movies too but now it seems action movies are overrated and slipping far away from reality.Same reason why i only keep watching the first and second movies but the 3rd seems fine but the 4rth ? indeed that it is not only overrated but also over acting (just my 2 cents in here no hard feelings because I am also a fan of Mr. John Wick )
